entities.name: gold prospector
entities.description: The person who sifts for gold is compared to a gold prospector.

entities.name: little old man
entities.description: A little old man rises out of the swirling mass in the Pensieve.

entities.name: Pensieve
entities.description: The Pensieve is a device where memories are stored and can be reviewed.

entities.name: ha ir
entities.description: The little old man has a thatch of hair covering his eyes.

entities.name: Slytherin
entities.description: The locket is said to have belonged to Slytherin.

entities.name: Merlin
entities.description: A story about Merlin's favourite teapot is mentioned as a comparison.

entities.name: young witch
entities.description: A young witch brought the locket to be sold.

relationships.description: The little old man is in the Pensieve.
The young witch brought the locket to be sold.
